title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 3249 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
June 18, 2018
On Monday, June 18, 2018, the President signed into law:H.R. 3249, the “Project Safe Neighborhoods Grant Program Authorization Act of 2018,” which establishes the Project Safe Neighborhoods Block Grant Program in the Justice Department’s Office of Justice Programs to improve existing partnerships to reduce violent crime.
